actionUnits.condition: On EventTrigger PointerClick (eventID=4; script guid d0b148fe25e99eb48b9724523833bab1) on GameObject 'Building101' (PrefabInstance/fileID 137028025) which has a Bank MonoBehaviour (component fileID 137028027; script guid b78288e601dcaac41ae0297908e55692).
